trans-unit.source: Specifies the editing mode for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />
trans-unit.target: Specifica la modalità di modifica per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> properties use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> to specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> behaves when it receives input from a tablet pen.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> utilizzare le proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> per specificare il modo in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> si comporta quando riceve l'input da una penna di Tablet PC.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to allow users to partially erase strokes with the inverted tip of a stylus.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come consentire agli utenti di cancellare parzialmente i tratti con la punta dello stilo invertito.

trans-unit.source: An elliptical cursor appears on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> when the user erases ink.
trans-unit.target: Un cursore ellittico viene visualizzata sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> quando l'utente cancella l'input penna.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the pen erases part of a stroke when the pen intersects the stroke.
trans-unit.target: Indica che la penna cancella parte di un tratto quando lo interseca.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the pen erases an entire stroke when the pen intersects the stroke.
trans-unit.target: Indica che la penna cancella l’intero tratto quando lo interseca.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> responds to gestures, and does not receive ink.
trans-unit.target: Indica che <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> risponde ai movimenti e non riceve input penna.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that ink appears on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> when the pen sends data to it.
trans-unit.target: Indica che l’input penna viene visualizzato su <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> quando la penna gli invia i dati.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> responds to gestures, and receives ink.
trans-unit.target: Indica che <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> risponde ai movimenti e riceve input penna.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action is taken when the pen sends data to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica che quando la penna invia dati a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />non viene eseguita alcuna azione.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the pen selects strokes and elements on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica che la penna seleziona tratti ed elementi su <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
